column4: UPDATE 2-U.S. FTC makes second request on Broadcom's bid for Qualcomm
column5: Jan 19 The U.S. Federal Trade Commission has made a second request for information on chipmaker Broadcom Ltd's $103 billion hostile bid for Qualcomm Inc   Broadcom said in a statement on Friday  a move that could indicate heightened antitrust scrutiny.

column4: BRIEF-Broadcom Receives Second Request From FTC For Proposed Acquisition Of Qualcomm
column5: * BROADCOM RECEIVES SECOND REQUEST FROM FTC UNDER HART-SCOTT-RODINO ACT FOR PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF QUALCOMM

column4: U.S. FTC set to make 2nd request on Broadcom's bid for Qualcomm -sources
column5: Jan 19 The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is set to make a second request for information on chipmaker Broadcom Ltd's $103 billion hostile bid for Qualcomm Inc   people familiar with the matter said on Friday  indicating heightened antitrust scrutiny.

column4: BRIEF-Elliott Believes Qualcomm Can Deliver Value To Shareholders At Prices For NXP Higher Than $135/Share
column5: * ELLIOTT BELIEVES QUALCOMM CAN DELIVER VALUE TO ITS SHAREHOLDERS AT PRICES FOR NXP HIGHER THAN $135 PER SHARE

column4: Elliott says chipmaker NXP worth more than $135 per share
column5: Elliott Management Corp said on Friday NXP Semiconductors NV is worth much more than its previous assessment of $135 per share and Qualcomm Inc's $110 offer to buy the chipmaker.

column4: Elliott says chipmaker NXP worth more than $135 per share
column5: Jan 19 Elliott Management Corp said on Friday NXP Semiconductors NV is worth much more than its previous assessment of $135 per share and Qualcomm Inc's $110 offer to buy the chipmaker.
